title: Voting and rights in illiberal democracy

content.question: An illiberal democracy would typically be characterized by

choices.label: high voter turnout in single-party elections
military rule coupled with political freedoms
colonial rule and a procedure-based legal system
market-based economic arrangements and limited suffrage
elections coupled with restrictions on individual civil liberties

content.answer: elections coupled with restrictions on individual civil liberties

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
